title: Nutriota Vitamin B1 | 25 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: HIGH DOSAGE VITAMIN B1, 25 MG PER CAPSULE - Each vegan capsule contains 25 mg of vitamin B1 (active ingredient: thiamine hydrochloride). Each bottle contains 180 capsules. WHY VITAMIN B1? Thiamine Vitamin B1 helps keep the nervous system and brain healthy and contributes to normal energy metabolism.
descriptionContent: Vitamin B1, also called thiamine, is a fundamental nutrient to convert foods into energy, support nervous system functions and promote the metabolism of carbohydrates, proteins and fats. Our supplement offers all the benefits of vitamin B1 in easy-to-swallow capsules, suitable for vegans and vegetarians. It is GMO-free and manufactured in line with stringent GMP standards.
ingredientsContent: Bulking agent (microcrystalline cellulose), capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropyl methylcellulose), thiamine hydrochloride (vitamin B1), anti-caking agent (magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide).
generalInfoContent:
• Package Dimensions: 11.1 x 5.9 x 5.6 cm; 58.5 g
• Units: 180.00 Count
• Brand: Nutriota
• Format: Capsule
• Age Range Description: Adult
• Manufacturer: Nutriota
• ASIN: B0CNKKJF5M
